item.title: Uses
item.description: My desk Setup Here is a list of my hardware, software: Standing desk Work laptops: Dell / Lenovo Thinkpads Dell Monitor External SSD Apps Duck Duck Go Brave browser Spotify Smart home Ring Stick up cam Bseed Voltage protector GE Cync Switches Marshall speaker Off desk Bose earbuds Garmin Forerunner 965 Sony a6000 Here is some more inspo! uses.tech.
